name: Ludo
tagline: Open Source iOS game from scratch.
body:
# Intent

The game will target iPad. I'm writing all the code from scratch*.

I'll be using C*, the filenames are .m because I'm GLKMath library, which is again C based but for some reasons doesn't compiles well with plain C files.

The game is based on [popular game called Ludo](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ludo_%28board_game%29). I'm not sure about the name, so for the time being lets call it Ludo.
I'm hoping to make it online multiplayer, with computer AI.
For now, there are just 2 Cubes revolving around the center of the screen.

* as much as possible.

![Two cubes](http://i.imgur.com/ZBhLjVZ.png)
